#### **Data Mining in Health Care** 

This study group is led by Simon Olivier Guienguere <<simonolivier.guie1@ucalgary.ca>>

![](./img/dm_simon_2018aug06.gif){width=400px}

Numerous industries successfully apply Data Mining techniques to extract information or to Discover Patterns in their large datasets. It helps the Retail industry model Customer Response. It helps Banks Predict Customer Profitability. It serves similar use cases in Telecom, Manufacturing, the Automotive Industry, and Higher Education. What about Healthcare?

* [Register!  Friday August 10, 2018 at Health Science Library 1459 from 5 pm to 6 pm](https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/data-mining-in-healthcare-tickets-48749286428?utm_term=eventurl_text){target="_blank"}
